snippet.title: MARGARETA Official Trailer (Indie Horror Game)
snippet.description:
THE GAME IS OUT NOW ON GAMEJOLT AND ITCH.IO!
gamejolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/margareta/643046
itch.io https://jordiboi.itch.io/margareta

You find yourself awake in a mysterious underground labyrinth with no memory of how you got there, Find clues, solve puzzles and hide from the mad man as you look for a way out of the tunnels! 

Margareta is a singleplayer horror game with elements of comedy, and will be released in about 2 weeks (date and more info will be revealed next week so make sure to tune back)

This is our first ever full lenght game and we really hope you will enjoy it!

About us:
We're two students from Sweden that love creating everything there is to create! And this is our channel! Join us in the world of gaming as you play our first ever game MARGARETA, or in audio form my listening to our podcast (The Nordiboi Podcast) wherever you find podcasts! Or just chill here, drink a nice cup of tea and turn on that notification bell to check out our upcoming short films and animated shows! 
*Only on The Nordi Productions Channel!
